channel.title: Gunman Kills Pastor of Illinois Church
channel.description:
MARYVILLE, Ill. (March 8) -- A pastor shot and killed during his Sunday sermon deflected the first of the gunman's four rounds with a Bible, sending a confetti-like spray of paper into the air in a horrifying scene that congregants initially thought was a skit, police said. The gunman strode down the aisle of the sprawling First Baptist Church shortly after 8 a.m. and briefly spoke with The Rev. Fred Winters, then pulled out a .45-caliber semiautomatic pistol and began firing until it jammed, Illinois State Police Director Larry Trent said. Churchgoers wrestled the gunman to the ground as he waved a knife, slashing himself and two other people, Trent said.
http://news.aol.com/article/illinois-church-shooting/374149 At least they caught the guy.

item.title: Gunman Kills Pastor of Illinois Church
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

He should have saved the Bible and sacrificed his life. I thought thats what Pastors do?

Read full topic

item.title: Gunman Kills Pastor of Illinois Church
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:4, topic:266524”][quote author=Square link=topic=351994.msg2700693#msg2700693 date=1236568968]
The guy either has really bad aim, or the paster knows how to block a bullet with something as small as a bible. All in all, sort of weird how it blocked four bullets-- too bad it didn’t block the fifth.
[/quote]

Idiot.

It only blocked the first of the four bullets.[/quote]

Don’t you just love it when people don’t read things properly!

Read full topic
